Name: Shallot
SeedDescription: Plant these in the spring. Takes 8 days to mature.

SeedDescriptionLocalization.es: Plántalas en primavera. Tardan 8 días en madurar.
SeedDescriptionLocalization.de: Pflanze sie im Frühling. Wächst in 8 Tagen heran.
SeedDescriptionLocalization.fr: À planter au printemps. Prend 8 jours pour arriver à maturité.
SeedDescriptionLocalization.hu: Ezeket tavasszal ültesd el. 8 napig tart megérniük.
SeedDescriptionLocalization.ja: 春植えの作物。そだつのに8日かかる。
SeedDescriptionLocalization.pt: Plante-as na primavera. Leva 8 dias para amadurecer.
